CellParameterAccess.hh

00001 #ifndef _CellParameterAccess_hh_
00002 #define _CellParameterAccess_hh_
00003 
00004 #include <string>
00005 #include <EVENT/LCCollection.h>
00006 #include <EVENT/LCParameters.h>
00007 #include <CellParameter.hh>
00008 
00009 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00010 #include <sstream>
00011 #include <stdexcept>
00012 #endif
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00017 class CellParameterAccess
00018 {
00019 public:
00023   CellParameterAccess(const std::string &col_name, EVENT::LCEvent * evtP) {
00024     // may throw exception:
00025     _cellParameterCol = evtP->getCollection( col_name ) ;
00026     
00027     _indexOffset.clear();
00028     _cellParameterCol->getParameters().getIntVals(std::string("ModuleStartIndex"),_indexOffset);
00029   };
00030  
00035   UInt_t getIndexOffset(UInt_t module_index) const {
00036 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00037     if (module_index>=_indexOffset.size()) {
00038       std::stringstream message;
00039       message << "CellParameterAccess::getIndexOffset> module index (" << module_index << ") is out of range ("
00040               << _indexOffset.size() << ")";
00041       throw std::out_of_range(message.str());
00042     }
00043 #endif    
00044     return _indexOffset[module_index];
00045   };
00046 
00051   UInt_t getIndex(UInt_t module_index, UInt_t cell_index) const
00052   {
00053     UInt_t index_offset=getIndexOffset(module_index);
00054 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00055     UInt_t next_cell=_cellParameterCol->getNumberOfElements();
00056     if (module_index+1<_indexOffset.size()) {
00057       next_cell=_indexOffset[module_index+1];
00058     }
00059     if (cell_index >= next_cell-_indexOffset[module_index]) {
00060       std::stringstream message;
00061       message << "CellParameterAccess::getIndex> cell index (" << cell_index << ") is out of range ("
00062               << next_cell-_indexOffset[module_index] << ")";
00063       throw std::out_of_range(message.str());
00064     }
00065 #endif
00066     index_offset+=cell_index;
00067     return index_offset;
00068   };
00069 
00075   CellParameter getCellParameter(UInt_t module_index, UInt_t cell_index) {
00076     // may throw an exception 
00077     UInt_t index=getIndex(module_index,cell_index);
00078 
00079     return CellParameter(_cellParameterCol->getElementAt(index));
00080   };
00081 
00087   const CellParameter getCellParameter(UInt_t module_index, UInt_t cell_index) const {
00088     // may throw an exception 
00089     UInt_t index=getIndex(module_index,cell_index);
00090 
00091     const CellParameter * const cell_parameter=dynamic_cast<CellParameter *>(_cellParameterCol->getElementAt(index));
00092 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00093     if (!cell_parameter ) {
00094       throw std::logic_error("CellParameterAccess::getCellParamter> Collection contains elements which are not of type CellParameter");
00095     }
00096 #endif
00097     return *cell_parameter;
00098   };
00099 
00106   CellParameter getCellParameter(UInt_t index) {
00107 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00108     if (index>=static_cast<UInt_t>(_cellParameterCol->getNumberOfElements())) {
00109       std::stringstream message;
00110       message << "CellParameterAccess::getCellParameter> index (" << index << ") is out of range ("
00111               <<  _cellParameterCol->getNumberOfElements() << ")";
00112       throw std::out_of_range(message.str());
00113     }
00114 #endif    
00115 
00116     return CellParameter(_cellParameterCol->getElementAt(index));
00117   };
00118 
00125   const CellParameter getCellParameter(UInt_t index) const {
00126 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00127     if (index>=static_cast<UInt_t>(_cellParameterCol->getNumberOfElements())) {
00128       std::stringstream message;
00129       message << "CellParameterAccess::getCellParameter> index (" << index << ") is out of range ("
00130               <<  _cellParameterCol->getNumberOfElements() << ")";
00131       throw std::out_of_range(message.str());
00132     }
00133 #endif    
00134 
00135     return CellParameter(_cellParameterCol->getElementAt(index));
00136   };
00137   
00138 private:
00139   LCCollection *_cellParameterCol; 
00140   IntVec _indexOffset;             
00143 };
00144 }
00145 #endif
